00019 #ifndef LSM_PLUGIN_IPC_HPP
00020 #define LSM_PLUGIN_IPC_HPP
00021 
00022 #include <map>
00023 #include "libstoragemgmt/libstoragemgmt_common.h"
00024 
00025 template < typename K, typename V > class LSM_DLL_LOCAL static_map {
00026   private:
00027     std::map < K, V > _m;
00028   public:
00029     static_map(const K & key, const V & val) {
00030         _m[key] = val;
00031     }
00032 
00033     static_map < K, V > &operator()(const K & key, const V & val) {
00034         _m[key] = val;
00035         return *this;
00036     }
00037 
00038     operator   std::map < K, V > () {
00039         return _m;
00040     }
00041 };
00042 
00043 #endif
